about_the_game:
Blockremental: Click, Dig, Automate, Survive!

Alone on a mysterious island, the last remnant of a vanished civilization, you must shape your own future. With a unique drilling platform, explore the depths, gather resources, and build a shelter. But beware—you’re not alone. Hostile golems rise from the darkness, threatening to destroy your base. Defend your island, tame the local wildlife, and optimize your infrastructure to survive and thrive.

🏝️ Clicks and Exploration

In Blockremental, every click matters. Start by breaking a single block, then another, collecting resources to upgrade your platform. But the game goes beyond simple clicking: explore every corner of your island to uncover hidden materials and refine your setup. Every upgrade brings you closer to greater efficiency while leaving room for discovery and creativity.

🛠️ Automation and Energy Management

Why do everything manually when you can build a mechanical empire? Set up machines to mine for you. Manage an energy network—power your installations with generators that require maintenance, optimization, and defense. Create smooth production chains and improve them to maximize efficiency, even when you're away. A true challenge in strategic and incremental management!

🏡 Shape Your Own Sanctuary

Your island is your refuge. Customize it as you see fit, personalize every corner, and transform it into a true haven. Add decorations, install lighting, and give character to your platform and base. Every player can create a unique space, balancing comfort and efficiency.

🐾 A Living Island to Explore

Your island isn’t just a playground—it’s filled with secrets and natural resources. Trek through the mountains, uncover hidden deposits like a coal mine perched high above, and interact with the local wildlife. Some animals can even be tamed, becoming valuable allies that provide bonuses or simply keep you company in your solitude.

🛡️ Defend Your Island Against the Golems

The depths hide many mysteries—but also dangers. Stone golems regularly rise from the ground to attack your installations. Build strategic defenses, set up turrets, and protect your infrastructure to continue progressing with peace of mind. Every island upgrade strengthens your ability to withstand assaults.

🎨 A Relaxing Yet Engaging Game

With its colorful voxel graphics and fully customizable texture packs, Blockremental offers a soothing atmosphere that encourages creativity. Its immersive soundscape enhances the relaxing experience while maintaining a compelling sense of progression. Whether you enjoy incremental games, strategic challenges, or a chill adventure where you build at your own pace, this game has something for you.

Five Reasons to Love Blockremental

✅ Break: Destroy blocks, collect resources, and shape the terrain to your liking.
✅ Build: Upgrade your platform, set up machines, and develop a functional ecosystem.
✅ Manage: Automate production, optimize power supply, and ensure your installation runs smoothly.
✅ Defend: Protect your island from golems with strategically placed defenses.
✅ Create: Build a space that reflects you, relax, and let your imagination run wild.

Add Blockremental to your wishlist now and get ready to click, dig, and automate your way to success!

short_description: Blockremental is a mining, automation, and survival game set on a mysterious island. Dig, gather resources, build machines, and defend your base against hostile golems. Explore, optimize your infrastructure, and create a unique refuge in this evolving voxel world!
